name: Project Cat
description:
Project Cat!

A mini game (a one level prototype) where you run around as a cat!  Enjoy!  

Can you find all 6?

Controls:

Arrow keys left & right = move
Arrow key up = jump when a line is visible.
Note: you need to slow down to be able to jump upwards.
Note: you can jump far if you run fast off an edge and press jump.

Future...

I might continue this project at some point.
